LanguageData.ELS_Recipe_Make_MechSerumHealer.label: Make Healer Mech Serum
LanguageData.ELS_Recipe_Make_MechSerumHealer.descript: Use an empty mechanite serum syringe to make a Healer Mech Serum.
LanguageData.ELS_Recipe_Make_MechSerumResurrector.des: Use an empty mechanite serum syringe to make a Resurrector Mech Serum.
